meanings.sent1: She always prefiles her documents before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: He prefiling his taxes to avoid any last-minute stress.
meanings.sent3: The organized student prefiles her assignments to stay ahead.
meanings.sent4: Like a squirrel storing nuts for winter, she prefiles important papers for future use.
meanings.sent5: Prefiling important paperwork is like planting seeds for a successful harvest.

meanings.definition: A file that is prepared in advance.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to keep all your prefiles in a separate folder.
meanings.sent2: The prefiles for the meeting were neatly arranged on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The prefiles in the cabinet were labeled with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent4: The prefiles acted as a safety net in case of any unexpected delays.
meanings.sent5: Having prefiles ready saved them a lot of time during the project.
